mapper.select: SELECT telegram.chat_id FROM member_auth as auth INNER JOIN member_telegram as telegram ON auth.member_id = telegram.member_id WHERE auth.member_id = #{memberId} AND auth.is_auth = 'Y' AND telegram.is_delete = 'N'
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO member (member_id, insert_date) VALUES (#{memberId}, now());
INSERT INTO member_password (member_seq, member_password, insert_date) VALUES (#{memberSeq}, #{password}, now());
INSERT INTO member_auth (member_id, member_auth_key, insert_date) VALUES (#{memberId}, #{authKey}, now());
INSERT INTO member_telegram (member_id, chat_id, insert_date) VALUES (#{memberId}, #{chatId}, now());
mapper.select: SELECT member_auth_key FROM member_auth WHERE member_id = #{memberId} AND is_auth = 'N'
mapper.update: UPDATE member_auth SET is_auth = 'Y' WHERE member_id = #{memberId} AND member_auth_key = #{authKey}
mapper.select: SELECT member.member_id, password.member_password FROM member as member INNER JOIN member_password as password ON member.member_seq = password.member_seq WHERE member.member_id = #{memberId} AND member.member_status = '1'
